attributes.title: Keep TikTok
attributes.review: Hey man don’t get rid of TikTok it’s a pretty cool app and your a cool dude you would be an even cooler dude if u didn’t get rid of the app thank you.

attributes.title: This app is horrible
attributes.review: This app is the most atrocious thing l’ve seen in years

attributes.title: MADE GHOSTS COME TO MY HOUSE 😡 👻
attributes.review: I just recently downloaded the app and somehow these weird Christian men in ghost costumes came to my house and sexually assaulted my dog!! Don’t download this app, it spawns ghost men!!

attributes.title: Delete the app
attributes.review: The app took my information and gave it to China.

attributes.title: Don’t get this app
attributes.review: This app is useless Don’t get it it will give you night mers

attributes.title: This is honestly sad
attributes.review: This app gave me a seizure and I had to hospitalized because of how disgusting and bad it was 😖 I’m so traumatized 😔✌️FYI I will be suing 😙✌️ so bring me my bag 💼😜😔

attributes.title: i am now hospitalized
attributes.review: i had to get a whole new phone to review this horrible app, just like our “president” this app acts like a parasite with some of the most illogical add ons and ads. my phone couldn’t handle the sheer stupidity this app radiates -30/10

attributes.title: BLACK LIVES MATTER
attributes.review: ✨🧚🏻‍♀️This is a terrible app I didn’t want Cheeto puff. ✨🧚🏻‍♂️  black lives matter, all countries matter. Please vote blue this November , we can do this ✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This is literally the worst app EVER, I’ve never been more angry about an app in my entire life... plz get THIS OFF the App Store

attributes.title: Baddd
attributes.review: I just wanted to support Trump! He is a great president! But this app is horrible I couldn’t even use it since it glitches ALL THE TIMEE!
